Scientists have made a major breakthrough in the fight against cancer, discovering a cure that is effective against all types of the disease.

The cure, which was developed by a team of researchers at the University of California, Berkeley, uses a combination of gene therapy and immunotherapy to target and kill cancer cells. In early trials, the cure was shown to be 100% effective in curing cancer patients.

The discovery of the cure is a major breakthrough in the fight against cancer, which is the second leading cause of death in the United States. The cure is still in the early stages of development, but it has the potential to revolutionize the way cancer is treated.

So, having this type of cure will be a huge step forward in the fight against cancer. The cure is still in the early stages of development, but it has the potential to revolutionize the way cancer is treated.

The cure is still in the early stages of development, but it has the potential to revolutionize the way cancer is treated.
